title: A sample risk
attack_tree:
This risk is manifested by the following attacks:

* <<branch "Break into safe"  AND>>

To break into the safe, the attack will need access, and safe cracking capabilities

** <<leaf "Access" "ac">>
** <<leaf "Safe Cracking Capabilities" ac>>
** <<control "A sample procedure">>

* <<leaf "do something" ac>>
v1_computed_attack_tree:
* <<rendered_branch "Root" OR 0.11214492187500001 "Highly Unlikely">>
** <<rendered_branch "Cabbages" AND 0.11214492187500001 "Highly Unlikely">>
*** <<rendered_leaf "Something" 0.525 "Realistic Possibility">>
*** <<rendered_leaf "Something 2 kjh" 0.775 "Likely">>
*** <<rendered_control "A sample procedure" 0.525 "Realistic Possibility">>
*** <<rendered_control "A sample procedure" 0.525 "Realistic Possibility">>
twsm_assessment_description:
<$button>
Edit Attack Tree
<$action-setfield draft_attack_tree={{!!attack_tree}} draft_impact={{!!twsm_impact}} edit_attack_tree=yes/>
</$button>
twsm_mitigation_description:
\define rendered_branch(name, operand, probability, phia)
Branch: $name$ ($operand$) = $phia$
\end

\define rendered_leaf(name, probability, phia)
Leaf: $name$  = $phia$
\end

\define rendered_control(name, probability, phia)
<<twsmname "$name$">>  = $phia$
\end

\define branch(name, operand: "OR")
Branch: $name$ ($operand$)
\end

\define leaf(name, probability: "Highly Likely")
Leaf: $name$ ($probability$)
\end

\define subtree(name)
Sub-tree: $name$
\end


\define control(name)
Control: $name$
\end

<$transclude field=v1_computed_attack_tree/>
